title: A 'cold Earth' exoplanet just 146 light-years away might be in its star's habitable zone  —  if it exists
description: The planet is one of the best worlds for follow-up studies to determine whether it could be habitable or not.
content: The planet is one of the best worlds for follow-up studies to determine whether it could be habitable or not.
